messages.body: $BB BlackBerry Secure Adds New Software Capabilities Aimed at Enterprise Users, IT administrators, and Developers https://t.co/mOXv2GSr6k $MSFT $AAPL $GOOGL $AMZN

links.title: BlackBerry Secure Adds New Software Capabilities Aimed at Enterprise Users, IT administrators, and Developers
links.description: In today's hyperconnected world the need for efficiency, compatibility, and security is more essential than ever. As part of BlackBerry's goal to empower the securely connected workforce we are releasing new software capabilities to bolster our BlackBerry Secure platform. BlackBerry enables workforce productivity with secure anytime, anywhere collaboration across any endpoint.

links.title: No Love For Facebook, As Amazon Continues Global Conquest
links.description: Well, that came out of left field. I was surprised by the broader market sell-off today. The Facebook sell-off, not so much. Afterall, I wrote on Saturday, that Facebook had been troubled now for some time, and I think this may only be beginning of a further decline.

$AAPL RBC Capital's Amit Daryanani sees big potential ahead for Apple's services business. https://stocknews.com/news/aapl-analyst-buy-apple-inc-aapl-on-strong-services-unit-growth/

links.title: Analyst: Buy Apple Inc. (AAPL) On Strong Services Unit Growth
links.description: Apple Inc. (NASDAQ:AAPL) may be facing worse-than-expected iPhone sales for its current generation devices, but investors are ignoring a potentially big positive in its services business. That's according to RBC Capital analyst Amit Daryanani, who wrote a bullish note to clients early this week regarding Apple's ability to generate revenue from its hundreds of millions of current users.

messages.body: Accretive combinations, complements & contributions of large networks: https://techcrunch.com/2018/03/19/apple-ibm-extend-partnership-with-watson-core-ml-coupling/ $IBM $AAPL

links.title: Apple, IBM add machine learning to partnership with Watson-Core ML coupling
links.description: Apple and IBM may seem like an odd couple, but the two companies have been working closely together for several years now. That has involved IBM sharing its enterprise expertise with Apple and Apple sharing its design sense with IBM. The companies have actually built hundreds of enterprise apps running on iOS devices.

links.title: How a Secret Strategy Helps BlackBerry and Microsoft Solve Government's Mobile Problem
links.description: Every once in a while, I run into something amazing. In this case, it is an effort announced at the AFCEA Defensive Cyber Operations Symposium that should ensure that BlackBerry and Microsoft dominate government and high-security enterprise mobile solutions, an effort that is not actually driven by Microsoft or BlackBerry.

links.title: U.K. investigating Facebook's response to alleged data breach - Article - BNN
links.description: LONDON - Britain is investigating whether Facebook did enough to secure data after reports that a political consultancy hired by Donald Trump improperly accessed information about 50 million Facebook users, Information Commissioner Elizabeth Denham said on Monday.
